
- According to a Kaggle survey, which is the most important technical skill for a data scientist to develop?<br/> 
Python

- The US Bureau of Labor Statistics estimates “much faster than average” job growth in data science over the next 10 years. What percentage did they estimate?<br/> 
31%

- Where is the best place to host your portfolio?<br/> 
GitHub

- What is ATS software?<br/> 
Software that tracks applicants and their resumes  

- If you use a bulleted list, the bullets should be:<br/> 
Informative but concise 

- What is a necessary set of skills and knowledge for a data scientist?<br/>
Statistics and probability 

- What is a characteristic function that data scientists do?<br/>
Build machine learning or deep learning models to help make business decisions. 

- What percentage of global companies are using data analytics in making business decisions?<br/> 
About 49% 

- In what field(s) do data scientists commonly work?<br/> 
Many different fields 

- What is a good source of portfolio content?<br/> 
Freelance work 

- What is a good way to decide which skills to highlight in your portfolio?<br/> 
Reading job listings 

- If you decide to build a new project to include in your portfolio, what is good advice?<br/> 
Use GitHub to host your projects. 


- Should you include hobbies and interests on your resume?<br/> 
Only if you have limited experience or skills relevant to the job. 

- What is usually the largest part of your resume?<br/>
Work experience 

- What is a good way to make your resume work well with search engine optimization (SEO) and applicant tracking system (ATS) software?<br/> 
Add alt-text to every image, photo, and graphic you use. 
(Alt text, or alternative text, is a brief description added to images and other visual elements in digital content. Its primary purpose is to convey the meaning or function of an image, making visual content accessible to people with vision disabilities and improving web accessibility. Additionally, alt text plays a crucial role in search engine optimization (SEO) by providing context to search engines.)
